info.title: Api V3 documentación
info.description: A sample API that uses a plant store as an example to demonstrate features in the OpenAPI specification

post.description: This endpoint allows obtaining the access token for OAuth2 clients

accessToken.description: The access token to be used in the API. DO NOT EXPOSE THIS TOKEN TO THE CLIENT!

get.description: This endpoint allows listing the stores of a brand registered in the system

post.description: This endpoint allows registering stores and sales channels in the system. Important!: Each request sent is processed as a new configuration, so if a store, sales channel, warehouse, etc. is not sent, its entire configuration will be deleted

channels.description: List of sales channels to create

accessToken.description: The access token to be used in the API. DO NOT EXPOSE THIS TOKEN TO THE CLIENT!

get.description: This endpoint allows obtaining information about a store registered in the system

put.description: This endpoint changes the status of a store in the system

active.description: State to which the store will be updated

get.description: Allows obtaining a detailed report of: synchronization status, categories, products, modifiers, modifier options, errors and warnings of the last synchronization of a store

parameters.name: vendorId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the brand, this identifier is provided by Trade

parameters.name: channelReferenceName
parameters.description: This field is required if the channelId attribute is not unique. Unique reference name, this name will be used for the search and association of the standardized channel

parameters.name: listName
parameters.description: Este campo es requerido si se utiliza en el atributo 'additionalInfo.relatedLists' en la sincronización de canales de venta. Nombre de la lista.

errors.description: Error report found in the last synchronization

warnings.description: Report of notices found in the last synchronization

individualUpdates.description: Determines if there were individual product or store updates

childCategories.description: List of subcategories synchronized and associated with the category

modifierOptions.description: List of options synchronized and associated with the modifier

productModifiers.description: List of modifiers synchronized and associated with the product

productListing.description: List of products synchronized and associated with the category

list.description: Complete report of synchronized data (categories, products, modifiers, options, etc.)

post.description: This endpoint allows you to add a list in the system. Important: Each submitted request is processed as a new configuration, so if a product, category, modifier, etc. is not sent all your configuration will be deleted.

list.description: General information of the list where the defined products will be added

modifierGroups.description: Allows you to define a list of modifiers that will be used in the list

products.description: Allows you to define the products or items, as well as their organization in the list

upselling.description: Set of unique product identifiers used in the upsell

crossSelling.description: Set of unique product identifiers used in cross-selling

tags.description: Allows you to assign tags to the product

productModifiers.description: Allows you to associate modifiers to the product

additionalInfo.description: Allows you to define additional information using key-value pairs

categories.description: Allows you to define product categories as well as their organization in the list

ecommerceChannelId.description: Unified sales channel identifier, refers to the standardized channel identifier

channelReferenceName.description: Unique reference name, used for search and association of the standardized channel.

post.description: This service is exposed by Trade so that the client can obtain the access token that will be used in other methods
This service will need to be implemented on the client side so that Trade can consume it. This will serve to notify the client every time a new order entered event occurs.

get.description: Gets detailed information of a specific order by its ID.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of the order to query.

put.description: This endpoint allows you to update product information

price.description: Allows you to define the final price of the product (this price will be displayed in the app or the website)

scheduledActiveStatus.description: Future date on which you want to activate the product

scheduledInactiveStatus.description: Future date on which you want to inactivate the product

post.description: Allows you to redeem a local coupon using a UID and promotion code
Record tracking information for a specific order

processed_by.description: Name of the person processing the transfer

put.description: This endpoint updates information for an existing product

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific product based on the provided parameters.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product to query.

parameters.name: withCategories
parameters.description: Indicates whether categories should be included in the response.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a product based on externalId, vendorId, storeId, and channelId.

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: The external ID of the product.

put.description: This endpoint allows you to register or edit a list in the system. Important: Each submitted request is processed as a new configuration, so if a product, category, modifier, etc. is not sent all your configuration will be deleted

list.description: General information of the list to be created

ecommerceChannelId.description: Unified sales channel identifier, refers to the standardized channel identifier.

channelReferenceName.description: Unique reference name, used for search and association of the standardized channel.

listId.description: Unique identifier of the list. Ex: pickup-menu, daily-menu, ...

listName.description: Name that identifies the list. Ex: 'menu app'

vendorId.description: Unique brand identifier, provided by Trade.

storeId.description: Unique identifier of the store, refers to the storeId parameter of the creation of stores and sales channels. The 'replicate_in_all' value allows the current list to be replicated for all stores

channelId.description: Unique identifier of the sales channel, refers to the channelId parameter of the creation of stores and sales channels.

schedules.description: Allows you to apply a schedule to the list.

categories.description: Permite definir las categorías de productos, así como su organización en la lista.

products.description: Permite definir los productos o items, así como su organización en la lista.

modifierGroups.description: Permite definir un listado de modificadores que se utilizarán en la lista.

scheduledActivities.description: Permite programar la activación e inactivación de productos en una fecha futura.

vendorId.description: Unique brand identifier. *This identifier is provided by Trade.

address.example: PICHINCHA / QUITO / INAQUITO / AV. AMERICA N37-288 Y VILLALENGUA
